start.name: start
start.description: Start a continuous AI chat session

options.title: Custom title for the chat session

start.instructions:
‚Ä¢ Send messages directly in this thread
‚Ä¢ AI will respond automatically and remember context
‚Ä¢ Use buttons to control session settings
‚Ä¢ Thread will auto-cleanup after 24 hours
start.threadCreatedDesc: Your AI chat session has been started in {threadLink}, please go to that thread to begin chatting!
start.sessionExpired: ‚ùå Chat session has expired or does not exist
start.noPermission: ‚ùå You don't have permission to control this chat session
start.sessionEndedDesc: This AI chat session has been ended and the thread will be archived.
start.searchEnabled: Web search has been enabled, AI can now search for latest information.
start.searchDisabled: Web search has been disabled, AI will only use training data to respond.
start.sessionPausedDesc: This AI chat session has been paused. Messages will not be processed until resumed.
start.sessionResumedDesc: This AI chat session has been resumed. You can continue chatting normally.
start.historyClearedDesc: All conversation history has been cleared. Starting fresh!
start.sessionExportedDesc: Your conversation history has been exported and sent to you as a file.
